lead_paragraph: A news analysis article on Friday about the growing problem of evaluating past World Series championship teams that have been linked to performance-enhancing drugs misstated the relationship between one such team, the Boston Red Sox, and George J. Mitchell, who issued a report in 2007 about doping in baseball. He is a paid adviser to the team’s ownership group, not a minority owner.
